description: Gap-filling mitigated overshoot scenario with medium/low radiative forcing by the end of the 21st century.  The scenario follows SSP5-8.5, an unmitigated baseline scenario, through 2040, and then substantially negative net emissions thereafter.
keywords: ScenarioMIP, Tier 2, Scenario, SSP, RCP, SSP5, RCP3.4, RCP8.5, overshoot, future, SSP-based RCP
long_name: RCP3.4 overshoot scenario branching from SSP58.5
rationale: Explore the climate science and policy implications of a peak and decline in forcing during the 21st century.  This scenario fills a gap in existing climate simulations by investigating the implications of a substantial 21st century overshoot in radiative forcing relative to a longer-term target.

requirements.description: Scenario, from 2040 to the end of the 21st century.
requirements.label: 2040-2100 61 yrs min

requirements.description: Impose RCP3.4 overshoot forcing.  Beginning in 2040, reduce forcings from the 8.5 W/m2 pathway to 3.4 W/m2 by 2100.
requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 3.4, future, 21st century, SSP5, RCP3.4 overshoot
requirements.label: RCP34 overshoot Forcing

requirements.description: The standard solar forcing dataset recommended for usage is the solar reference scenario dataset which includes future solar forcing (2015-2299).  Includes total solar irradiance, F10.7 cm solar radio flux, and spectral solar irradiance for 10-100000 nm range.
requirements.keywords: Solar Forcing, Future, Solar, Spectral Irradiance, SSI, TSI
requirements.label: Future Solar Irradiance Forcing

requirements.description: Future solar particle forcing (2015-2299). For models with interactive stratospheric chemistry.  Proton forcing: HOx and NOx production by solar protons. Electron forcing:  Kp- or Ap-index to describe ionisation from electron precipitation in the lower thermosphere and upper mesosphere. Cosmic ray forcing:  ion-pair production by galactic cosmic rays.  CMIP6 models that do not have interactive chemistry should  prescribe the CMIP6 recommended ozone forcing data set.
requirements.keywords: Solar forcing, Future, Particle forcing, proton forcing, electron forcing, cosmic ray ionisation
requirements.label: Future Solar Particle Forcing

requirements.description: Initialisation is from year 2040 of the SSP5-8.5 experiment.
requirements.label: SSP5-85Initialisation2040

requirements.description: Use a coupled Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model
requirements.label: AOGCM Configuration
